system.description: The character uses their intellect to precisely place indirect fire, maximizing the psychological impact on enemies.
system.benefit: Whenever character or their Comrade fire a weapon with the Indirect quality, if at least one hit lands within Intelligence Bonus Metres of an enemy, the target must make a +20 Pinning Test.

specialAbilities.name: Precision Bombardment
specialAbilities.description: When using weapons with the Indirect quality, if at least one hit lands within Intelligence Bonus Metres of an enemy, the target must make a +20 Pinning Test (easier for them to resist).
